titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: INVASIVE BREAST CANCER TOTAL EXPECTED - Description

div.p: INVASIVE BREAST CANCER TOTAL EXPECTED is derived from the INVASIVE BREAST CANCER TOTAL OBSERVED and a predefined incidence rate (calculated every three years).
INVASIVE BREAST CANCER TOTAL EXPECTED should only be reported in Table A, B and C1 in the NHS Breast Screening Programme Central Return Data Set (KC62).
